alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 1:31AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Cook and Lake Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 129 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake, to near Dumbbell Lake, to near Beaver Bay, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clear Lake around 135 AM CDT. Alpine Lake and Finland around 140 AM CDT. Saganaga Lake and Little Marais around 145 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Sea Gull Lake, Sugar Loaf Cove, Tofte and Taconite Harbor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
